alert.note: Alert for Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 1:05PM EST until January 07 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Greene, Higher Elevations of Westmoreland, Fayette and Westmoreland Counties. In West Virginia, Wetzel County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please report snow or ice by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPittsburgh The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway and traffic conditions.
